basic_info.motto: enjoy learning, simple, just a decent person
basic_info.summary:
Most of my working career I have worked for myself. I have always had an
entrepreneurial "spirit". Though I have worked in warehouses and stores
such as Dollar General or Walgreens; I have always found myself wanting to own
or build a company. While self employed I mainly sold products through 
ecommerce but also taught myself architectural illustration by which I have
done many 3D rendering and animation projects.

experiences.details:
Responsible for obtaining clients through various marketing efforts and
live presentations. Constructed 3D model representations of client building
projects as well as rendering animated presentations.

Responsible for marketing through web platform (ebay) in addition to
customer service and sales.

Responsible for packing and wrapping of grocery products as they came
down conveyor belt.

projects.intro: Just a few simple projects as I continue to learn how to code.

assignments.title: Postcard
assignments.tagline: A simple postcard created using html5 and css.

assignments.title: Simple Instagram Feed
assignments.tagline: A static representation of an Instagram feed uisng HTML and CSS.
